name: Gaboot Adventures
description:
Game by Bomber Game

A game for Indiepocalypse Game Jam

*History
Mileon was kidnapped by the Outlander Wolf, so it's up to Gaboot to cross the 3 Places to enter the Outlander Wolf's castle 
*Controls
Left/Right: Moviment
Z/A: Jump
Enter/Start:Confirm
*Gimmicks
-Moviment
-Jump
-Wall Slide
